metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5156 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the GNU C Library. A recent fix for CVE-2023-4806 introduced the potential for a memory leak, which may result in an application crash.

notes.Note: ccdm94> as of 2023-10-19, no releases are vulnerable to this CVE, as the fix for CVE-2023-4806 has not yet been applied to glibc in any of these releases. Whenever CVE-2023-4806 is patched, the patch for CVE-2023-5156 must be included as well in order to avoid regressions and the inclusion of a new vulnerability in glibc.

criterions.comment: glibc package in jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
